title: Synchronice
author: Synchronice
content: A remote colleague of mine sells Bobcatminer 300 EU868 and asked me to help me in selling, so I'm posting this on this forum for him, so I can answer to every question and can guarantee the smooth deal.So, he sells two Bobcatminer 300 EU868 for $350. Both of them are brand new, unused in original box. He can ship them worldwide. Definitely, I guarantee that everything will go smoothly and you can feel safe but still, if you want, we can use a trusted escrow service.Check images of the product:
